fix.generatedCode:
# Server port configuration - set to a fixed port for reliable access
server.port=8080

# Spring Boot Actuator configuration
# Expose only the health endpoint for monitoring service status, avoiding exposure of sensitive endpoints
management.endpoints.web.exposure.include=health
# Enable the health endpoint (default is enabled, but explicitly set for clarity)
management.endpoint.health.enabled=true
# Optional: Show full health details (default is 'never' for security, set to 'when_authorized' if needed)
management.endpoint.health.show-details=when_authorized
